Reviews.Title: “Overnight In Berlin-Great Hotel and Service”
Reviews.Author: stones80123
Reviews.Content: arrived 9pm night morning flight day quoted 42 euro rate online reception delivered excellent rate clean appointed nice tv cable shower hot bed comfortable enjoyed building using key elevator staircase infant child staff kept food refrigerator brought morning met called taxi cab 430am morning berlin trip stay rate larger chains corporate feel

Reviews.Title: “Great for airport access, Good otherwise.”
Reviews.Author: inamesh Posted by a Cleartrip traveler
Reviews.Content: hotel excellent value money deal 40 euros night bathroom standard clean hotel short walk airport bus stop ubahn station getting berlin center lots cafesshops supermarket counter freshly prepared food friendly turkish doner opposite hotel decent smoky bar metro station hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great place for a stay if you have an early flight”
Reviews.Author: Anna K
Reviews.Content: hotel situated minutes bus stop tegel airport wouldnt stay night noisy traffic poor sound isolation heard neighbors time 1 oclock morning couldnt sleep hand liked furniture nice table chair wardrobe paper envelopes pen stuff table bed comfortable bathroom nice including hairdryer stuff helpful welcoming morning checkin time luggage little meant using computer fax elevator stairs hotel narrow recommend staying catch flight tegel

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Carat
HotelInfo.Address: Ollenhauerstrasse 111, 13403 Berlin, Germany
